about_the_game:
Get ready to lift some dust with the Super Speed Car Pack! This new add-on introduces 4 specially curated cars for you to collect and drive including the 2022 Volkswagen Golf R, 2022 Porsche 718 Cayman GT4 RS, 2020 KTM X-Bow GT2, and 2019 Elemental RP1.

Requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately). Not included with the Forza Horizon 5 Car Pass, Standard, Deluxe or Premium Editions.
detailed_description:
Get ready to lift some dust with the Super Speed Car Pack! This new add-on introduces 4 specially curated cars for you to collect and drive including the 2022 Volkswagen Golf R, 2022 Porsche 718 Cayman GT4 RS, 2020 KTM X-Bow GT2, and 2019 Elemental RP1.

Requires Forza Horizon 5 (game sold separately). Not included with the Forza Horizon 5 Car Pass, Standard, Deluxe or Premium Editions.
